name: html-gen3rate
description: Learning about AI by getting a chatbot to generate html code

scripts.build:express: npm run build && npm run copy-dist:express && npm run build:express --workspace backend
scripts.copy-dist:express: shx rm -rf backend/express/dist && shx mkdir -p backend/express/dist/public && shx cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/express/dist/public/ && shx rm -rf frontend/dist
